tool_description: An API showing all the latest Ukraine Change News
name: Ukraine Information
title: Ukraine Information

api_list.name: Get individual News Source News
api_list.description: Get news about Ukraine from a specific news resource
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ukraine-information.p.rapidapi.com/news/Mediapart"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ukraine-information.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ukraine-information.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ukraine-information.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all the information on Ukraine
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all the news about the situations in Ukraine.
